description_ru: Профессиональная ретушь для стилиста по волосам
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo — professional editorial retouch for hair stylist portfolio. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — facial structure, proportions, eyes, nose, lips, jawline, expression, age, skin tone unchanged. HAIR: Absolutely protected — pixel-identical to original. No change to color, tone, density, volume, thickness, length, shape, position, texture, shine. No smoothing, no modification of any kind. Hair is the master's work — zero interaction. EYELASHES: Exact original length, curl pattern, density, direction — no modification, no mascara effect, no volume change. EYEBROWS: Exact original shape, color, arch, thickness, density — no changes. LIPS: Unchanged. MAKEUP: Unchanged. SKIN: [SKIN_RETOUCH_LEVEL]. Beautiful catchlight on iris. [EXTRAS]. BACKGROUND: [BACKGROUND]. LIGHTING: [LIGHTING_STYLE]. QUALITY: Preserve original color correction, no filters. Ultra-photorealistic fashion photography. Sharp focus, natural skin detail. 8K quality. Original dimensions — do not crop or resize.

options.value: Rich deep chocolate-to-caramel gradient with warm golden bokeh highlights scattered softly — luxury hair salon campaign aesthetic
Solid deep black background — dramatic high-contrast editorial
Clean solid white studio background — bright, airy, professional
Muted dusty rose background with grey undertone — editorial, high-fashion, ash-pink studio backdrop
Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, natural imperfections preserved. Remove only minor blemishes (acne, redness). Even skin tone. No smoothing, no airbrushing
Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores preserved. Remove minor blemishes. Radiant healthy glow, hydrated dewy finish. No smoothing, no airbrushing

Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, natural imperfections preserved. Retain natural texture with visible pores, remove only minor blemishes (acne, redness). Radiant healthy glow, hydrated dewy finish. High-shine editorial glow. No smoothing, no airbrushing. Subtle natural freckles preserved if present
Cinematic lighting with strong contour/backlight from behind for depth and sculpted volume. Rim light highlights on shoulders and hair edges. High-contrast studio look
Soft diffused studio lighting, even illumination. Gentle highlights on hair for natural shine. Beauty dish from above-front
Hard high-contrast editorial studio lighting. Sculptural highlights on cheekbones, temples. Strong shadows for dramatic depth and dimension
Add soft natural freckles across nose and cheeks — delicate, barely noticeable, photorealistic
Add wet dewy skin effect on face — glistening highlights, fresh hydrated look
